game.name: Fishathon: The North Pole
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A fishing & exploration game where you are stranded in the North Pole as part of the yearly "Fishathon", a fierce 7-day tournament where only the best fisherman will come out on top and win a mysterious yet alluring prize.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A fishing & exploration game where you are stranded in the North Pole as part of the yearly "Fishathon", a fierce 7-day tournament where only the best fisherman will come out on top and win a mysterious yet alluring prize.
